title: Jon Hamm On The Evolution Of Don Draper On 'Mad Men'
teaser: Hamm has never won an Emmy despite 13 nominations, including two this year for Mad Men. In 2010, Hamm talked with Fresh Air about how Draper was "losing touch" with his life and the world around him.
contentencoded:
Hamm has never won an Emmy despite 13 nominations, including two this year for Mad Men. In 2010, Hamm talked with Fresh Air about how Draper was "losing touch" with his life and the world around him.

Originally broadcast Sept. 16, 2010.
